Name: Undecorated Stool of Sennedjem
Description: The stool belongs to the artisan Sennedjem, who worked on constructing and decorating royal tombs and temples at Thebes. The undecorated stool is painted in one color. It is supported by four legs and crossbars to rest evenly on the floor. It was placed in the tomb for the use of Sennedjem in the afterlife.
